description:
Web Developer Intern
 



 Company: SkillzenLoop
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Employment Type: Internship (Full\\-time)
 



 Duration: 1‚Äì3 Months
 



 Stipend: ‚Çπ15,000 per month
 



 Role Description
 



 SkillzenLoop is looking for an enthusiastic Web Developer Intern to join our development team. This role is designed for a budding developer who wants to bridge the gap between design and technology. You will assist in building, maintaining, and optimizing websites, ensuring they are visually appealing, user\\-friendly, and technically sound. You will gain exposure to both front\\-end aesthetics and back\\-end functionality.
 



 Primary Responsibilities
 



 ‚Ä¢ Website Development: Assist in developing and maintaining web pages using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Responsive Design: Implement mobile\\-first design principles to ensure websites work seamlessly across all devices and screen sizes.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Content Management: Help update website content, images, and metadata through various CMS platforms or direct code updates.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Optimization: Help improve website loading speeds and SEO performance by optimizing assets and code structure.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Testing \\& Quality: Conduct thorough cross\\-browser testing to identify and fix layout issues or functional bugs.
 



 Requirements
 



 ‚Ä¢ Education: Currently pursuing or a recent graduate in Computer Science, Web Design, Information Technology, or a related field.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Technical Proficiency: Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript. Familiarity with Bootstrap or Tailwind CSS is a plus.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Tooling: Basic knowledge of Git/GitHub for version control.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Attention to Detail: A sharp eye for typography, spacing, and overall layout consistency.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Learning Agility: A strong desire to stay updated with the latest web technologies and best practices.
 



 Internship Benefits
 



 ‚Ä¢ Stipend: A monthly payment of ‚Çπ15,000\\.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Certification: Official Internship Completion Certificate from SkillzenLoop.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Professional Growth: Performance\\-based Letter of Recommendation (LoR).
 



 ‚Ä¢ Mentorship: Hands\\-on guidance from senior developers and designers.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Remote Flexibility: 100% remote work structure with a focus on collaborative learning.

Focused on empowering individuals, PInterview provides high\\-quality mock interviewing opportunities through live online video or telephonic sessions with industry professionals. The platform enables job seekers to refine their interview skills and enhance their career prospects. With a mission to reshape interview preparation, PInterview offers specialized services such as mock admission interviews, placement interviews, coding interviews, and job interviews, assisting individuals worldwide in achieving their professional goals.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time, on\\-site role based in Bengaluru for an Associate Python Engineer 2\\. The role involves contributing to backend web development, collaborating with the software development team to build and enhance applications, and employing object\\-oriented programming techniques. The engineer will also work on database management and programming tasks while ensuring code quality and optimizing system performance. Additionally, you will troubleshoot and debug applications to ensure seamless functioning and user satisfaction.
   




**Qualifications**
* Experience in Back\\-End Web Development and Software Development

* A Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field is preferred
* Familiarity with industry best practices and agile development methodologies is a plus

title: AI QA/Testing Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
* Position: AI QA/Testing Engineer
* Location: Hyderabad
* Experience: 5 to 8 years
* Employment Type: contract


**Company Name: Pozent Technologies**
* Pozent is a rapidly growing company focused on delivering next\\-generation digital, data, and AI\\-driven solutions to global clients and achieve measurable business outcomes.
* Our team is geared towards innovation and thrives where talent meets opportunity.
* We work on Generative AI, Cloud, Data Engineering, Automation, and Full\\-Stack Development, delivering impactful projects


**Why join us:**
* Exciting Global Projects and career growth: Work directly with top clients and cutting\\-edge technologies providing a rapid learning curve, skill development, and clear career progression.
* Innovation Culture and supportive environment: You are not just joining a company ‚Äî you‚Äôre becoming part of a dynamic innovation ecosystem that empowers you to learn, explore, create, grow and lead.


**Role Overview:**
 Ensure quality, fairness, and reliability of AI/ML models through comprehensive testing, validation, and automation. Focus on model performance, bias detection, and ethical AI practices.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design and execute test strategies for AI/ML models and systems
* Perform model validation including accuracy, robustness, and performance testing
* Conduct bias and fairness testing to identify and mitigate discriminatory outcomes
* Develop automated testing frameworks for continuous model evaluation
* Test data pipelines, feature engineering, and model inference systems
* Create test cases for edge cases, adversarial inputs, and model behavior analysis
* Monitor model drift and performance degradation in production
* Collaborate with ML engineers and data scientists to ensure model quality standards


**Requirements:**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Data Science, or related field
* Strong experience in model validation and ML testing methodologies
* Proven expertise in bias and fairness testing for AI systems
* Hands\\-on experience with test automation frameworks and tools
* Understanding of ML model evaluation metrics and statistical testing
* Proficiency in Python and testing libraries (pytest, unit test)
* Knowledge of AI ethics, responsible AI principles, and regulatory requirements
* Experience with CI/CD pipelines and version control (Git)


**Preferred:**
* Experience testing various ML models (LLMs, computer vision, NLP, recommender systems)
* Familiarity with fairness metrics (demographic parity, equalized odds, disparate impact)
* Knowledge of adversarial testing and model robustness evaluation
* Experience with A/B testing and experimental design
* Understanding of data quality testing and validation
* Familiarity with ML frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow, scikit\\-learn)
* Experience with monitoring tools (MLflow, Weights \\& Biases, Evidently AI)
* Knowledge of GDPR, AI Act, or other AI governance frameworks
* should be strong in Python \\& must have done testing on AI \\& Gen AI projects


**Why This Role:**
* Ensures reliable and high\\-performing AI models through rigorous testing, validation, and automation to prevent production issues.
* Promotes fair and ethical AI by detecting bias early and enforcing responsible, transparent AI practices.

description:
**Company Description:** 
 ¬†
 



 ¬†
 



 At¬†Capla, we are redefining the future of surgery through intelligent, connected, and data\\-driven medical technologies. Our mission is to make surgery smarter, safer, and more human\\-centered¬†by combining the power of AI, machine learning, cloud computing, and advanced visualization systems. We are developing next\\-generation surgical navigation and OR integration platforms that empower surgeons with precision, real\\-time insights, and intuitive control \\-¬†ultimately improving¬†patient outcomes worldwide.¬†
 



 ¬†
 



 Capla‚Äôs¬†strength comes from its multidisciplinary team of healthcare professionals, surgeons, robotic and biomedical engineers, AI and ML specialists, quality experts, and data scientists. Together,¬†we‚Äôre¬†building an ecosystem of technologies that bring intelligence, accuracy, and trust to every step of the surgical workflow.¬†
 



 ¬†
 


* As an early and rapidly growing healthcare startup,¬†Capla¬†offers an exciting environment for those who want to be part of something transformational. Our team is expanding quickly across product, engineering, and clinical domains, creating abundant opportunities to innovate, learn, and grow. At¬†Capla, every individual contributes directly to shaping products that will define the future of modern surgery, where technology and compassion converge to enhance human lives.



  





**Job ID:** 
 ¬†CV26002¬†

 ¬†R\\&D¬†\\-¬†Software \\& User Experience¬†

 ¬†Bangalore¬†/ Hybrid¬†

 ¬†
 



 As a¬†
 **Software Engineer¬†\\-¬†UI/UX** 
 , you will¬†be responsible for¬†designing and developing intuitive, high\\-performance user interfaces for¬†Capla‚Äôs¬†surgical navigation systems running on¬†
 **ARM\\-based Linux platforms** 
 .¬†
 



 This role focuses on building reliable, safety\\-critical medical device software that enables surgeons to interact seamlessly with complex navigation and visualization systems in the operating room. You will work closely with clinical, system, and quality teams to ensure usability, performance, and regulatory compliance.¬†
 



  





**Responsibilities** 
 ¬†
 



**UI/UX Software Development**

* Design, develop, and¬†maintain¬†Qt\\-based UI applications using C\\+\\+

**System Integration**

**Usability \\& Performance**

**QARA / Documentation**

* Prepare software design documents, unit test reports, and traceability artifacts
* Support compliance with IEC 62304, IEC 62366, and 21 CFR Part 820
* Ensure all UI development follows¬†Capla‚Äôs¬†QMS processes



**Qualifications**

* Bachelor‚Äôs or¬†Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Electronics, or related field
* 3\\+ years of experience in¬†
 **C\\+\\+ and Qt\\-based UI development**
* Strong experience on Linux / Embedded Linux / ARM platforms
* Background in medical device software development



**Preferred**

* Experience working in regulated healthcare environments



 ¬†
 




 If interested, please reply with the Job ID in the subject line, along with your updated CV, current notice period, and expected compensation to ‚Äújobs@caplagroup.com‚Äù

title: ServiceNow ITSM Developer
description:
**Industry \\& Sector:** 
 Staffing and IT talent solutions serving enterprise technology organizations across IT Service Management (ITSM), cloud operations, and digital transformation programs. We place and manage technical professionals who design, implement, and support mission\\-critical ServiceNow platforms for large enterprises.
   

  

**Primary Job Title (standardized):** 
 ServiceNow Developer
   

  

**Location:** 
 India (On\\-site)
   

  

**About The Opportunity**
 We are recruiting for an experienced ServiceNow ITSM Developer to join a client\\-facing delivery team responsible for implementing and enhancing ServiceNow ITSM capabilities. This role focuses on building scalable, secure, and maintainable ServiceNow solutions that improve IT operations, incident and change management, and end\\-user experiences.
   

  

 Role \\& Responsibilities
   

  

* Design, develop and configure ServiceNow ITSM modules (Incident, Problem, Change, Request) using platform best practices.

description:

 4‚Äì7 Years

* Demonstrable experience
 **leading and building scalable microservices** 
 and
 **event‚Äëdriven applications** 
 .
* Ability to

 from design through to production.
* Address
 **technical debt** 
 with a pragmatic, commercially focused approach.

 **high‚Äëquality engineering deliverables** 
 .
* Deliver
 **reusable, shared components** 
 used across squads, teams, and products.
* Collaborate across teams and
 **align technical decisions** 
 with business goals.
* Expertise in
 **observability and reliability** 
 practices, using tools such as:
* OpenTelemetry
* Prometheus
* Grafana
* CloudWatch
* Strong understanding of
 **security best practices** 
 , including:
* HashiCorp Vault
* AWS Secrets Manager
* Certificate management
* Experience with
 **testing methodologies** 
 such as
 **TDD** 
 and
 **BDD** 
 , along with automation frameworks.
* Ability to design and implement
 **data‚Äëintensive, highly scalable architectures** 
 , including APIs, microservices, event\\-driven solutions, and serverless patterns.
* Solid understanding of
 **deployment strategies** 
 and
 **SRE principles** 
 .
* Interest or experience in
 **AI/ML technologies** 
 and emerging tools.



  





**Your Skills and Experience** 




**Programming** 



* Strong in
 **Java** 
 ,
 **TypeScript** 
 , and
 **JavaScript (Node.js)** 
 .
* Expertise in
 **Spring Boot** 
 for building scalable, high‚Äëperformance services.



**Frameworks \\& Platforms** 



* **Java**
* **React (TypeScript)**
* **Spring Boot / Spring EE** 
 for RESTful APIs and enterprise\\-grade applications.



**Architecture** 



* Microservices
* Domain‚ÄëDriven Design (DDD)
* Event‚Äëdriven systems using
 **RabbitMQ** 
 and/or
 **Apache Kafka**



**Databases** 



* Experience with:
* **SQL Server**
* **PostgreSQL**
* Other relational / NoSQL databases (e.g.,
 **DynamoDB** 
 )



**Cloud (AWS)** 




 Hands\\-on experience with:
 


* EC2
* Lambda
* ECS/Fargate
* RDS
* DynamoDB
* CloudFormation
* CDK
* CodePipeline
* CodeBuild
* CloudWatch



**CI/CD** 



* TeamCity
* Octopus Deploy
* GitHub \\& GitHub Actions



**Containers** 



* Kubernetes
* Docker



**Infrastructure as Code (IaC)** 



* Terraform
* CloudFormation
* Ansible



**Quality Engineering** 



* Strong advocate of
 **automated testing** 
 and quality\\-driven engineering practices.



**Frontend Capability (Nice to Have / Growth Area)** 



* Exposure or willingness to grow skills in:
* **TypeScript**
* **React**
* **Next.js**
* These are highly valued for delivering seamless end\\-to\\-end customer and developer experiences.



**AI \\& Chatbot Integration (Desirable)** 



* Exposure to building
 **AI\\-driven support tools** 
 .
* Experience integrating with
 **LLMs / ChatGPT** 
 for developer productivity.
* Understanding of
 **Model Context Protocol (MCP)** 
 or similar plugin / extension frameworks is a plus, as the squad owns an
 **AI ChatBot for developer enablement** 
 .



  





  





***S YNECHRON‚ÄôS DIVERSITY \\& INCLUSION STATEMENT***




  





 Diversity \\& Inclusion are fundamental to our culture, and Synechron is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. Our Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) initiative ‚ÄòSame Difference‚Äô is committed to fostering an inclusive culture ‚Äì promoting equality, diversity and an environment that is respectful to all. We strongly believe that a diverse workforce helps build stronger, successful businesses as a global company. We encourage applicants from across diverse backgrounds, race, ethnicities, religion, age, marital status, gender, sexual orientations, or disabilities to apply. We empower our global workforce by offering flexible workplace arrangements, mentoring, internal mobility, learning and development programs, and more.
 



  





 All employment decisions at Synechron are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to the applicant‚Äôs gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, disabled or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
